data.name: TD_AngelsEmbracement
data.value: Gives a {0}% chance when attacked to increase damage done by {2}%, armor by {3}% and magic-find by {4}% for {1} seconds.

data.name: TD_ArrowShower
data.value: Unleashes a Multi Shot every {0} seconds for {1} seconds.

data.name: TD_Bash
data.value: Instantly bashes the enemy with full power. Does (MeleeDamage + {0}) x {1}% damage.

data.name: TD_BattleAwareness
data.value: By improving your battle awareness you increase your chance to parry melee attacks. (Parry + {0}) * {1}%

data.name: TD_BattleShout
data.value: You roar to increase your valor. Increases (Strength + {0}) * {1}% for 60 seconds.

data.name: TD_Bladestorm
data.value: You go nuts after using Whirlwind, turning for another {0} times, dealing (MeleeDamage x {1}%) non-parry nor dodgeable damage. {2} sec duration.

data.name: TD_CounterAttack
data.value: You counter your enemy with an un-parryable attack after parrying an attack yourself. Deals (MeleeDamage x {0}%). {1} seconds cooldown.

data.name: TD_CriticalBalance
data.value: You learn to keep your combat balance even in the most critical situations. Increases damage done with critical attacks by {0}%.

data.name: TD_DoubleAttack
data.value: {0}% chance to attack twice instead of once on a normal melee attack. Can proc off of itself.

data.name: TD_Enrage
data.value: {0}% chance to enrage after getting attacked. Increases melee damage dealt by {1}% for {2} seconds.

data.name: TD_FireBomb
data.value: Plants a powerful bomb that deals ({0}% Ranged + {1}% Magic) fire area-damage.

data.name: TD_Frenzy
data.value: You go frenzy after dealing a melee Crit. Increases melee attack speed by {0}% for {1} seconds.

data.name: TD_Frustration
data.value: Increases chance to get a Double Attack by {0}% for {1} seconds. But frustrated as you are there exists a {2}% chance to hit yourself for {3}% MeleeDamage.

data.name: TD_GoForTheHead
TD_ImprovedBash
data.value: Increases chance to crit with Bash by {0}.

data.name: TD_ImprovedMultiShot
data.value: Reduces the cooldown of the Multi Shot skill by {0} seconds.

data.name: TD_LightArrow
data.value: Instantly releases a Light arrow. Does (RangedDamage + MagicDamage + {0}) x {1}% Light damage.

data.name: TD_LuckyBastard
data.value: Increases your Magic Find value by {0}%.

data.name: TD_Meditation
data.value: You improve your meditation techniques. Increases Mana Regeneration by {0} + {1}%.

data.name: TD_MultiShot
data.value: Instantly releases {0} arrows. Each arrow does {1}% RangedDamage.

data.name: TD_PiercingArrows
data.value: Increases the chance of arrows to pierce through the enemy by {0}%.

data.name: TD_PoisonedShot
data.value: Fires an arrow that deals (RangedDamage x {0}) instantly, ((Ranged + Magic)Damage x {1}) nature damage over {2} seconds; slowing the target by {3}%. {4} seconds cooldown.

data.name: TD_PoisonMastery
data.value: Studying the properties of poisoned herbs allows you to increase your damage done with poisons by {0}%.

data.name: TD_PotionMastery
data.value: Improves the effectiveness of healing and mana potions by {0}%.

data.name: TD_PushingAttack
data.value: Pushes the enemy, dealing MeleeDamage, with an increased pushing power of '{0}' to '{1}'.

data.name: TD_QuickHands
data.value: Increases Attack Speed and Spell Haste by {0}%.

data.name: TD_RapidFire
data.value: By using your inner rage you increase your ranged attack speed by {0}% and your chance to pierce by {1}% for {2} seconds.

data.name: TD_RecoverWounds
data.value: You recover from battle, increasing Life Regeneration by {0}% for {1} seconds.

data.name: TD_ShieldWall
data.value: Reduces physical damage taken by {0}%. As a penalty also reduces damage done by {1}% and movement speed by {2}%.

data.name: TD_SmoothedEmblazonment
data.value: You decide to always keep your jewelry shiny! Increases the amount of stats rings and necklaces give by {0}%.

data.name: TD_Sprint
data.value: Increases movement speed by {0}% for {1} seconds.

data.name: TD_Vitality
data.value: Hard training allows you to increase your Vitality by {0}%.

data.name: TD_Whirlwind
data.value: You spin with your sword, dealing (MeleeDamage x {0}%) non-parry nor dodgeable damage. {1} sec cooldown. {2} sec duration.

data.name: TD_Headshot
data.value: You aim for the head after landing a critical hit, firing a swift partially armor-ignoring arrow that has an improved chance to crit and pierce of {0}%.

data.name: TD_RogueWeaponMastery
data.value: You train your skills in the weapons of a rogue, increasing damage done with bows by {0}% and damage done with daggers by {1}%.

data.name: TD_Furor
data.value: You show the true fury inside you, increasing melee attack speed by {0}% for {1} seconds.

data.name: TD_QuickStrike
data.value: Requires a Dagger to be used! Swiftly strikes at the enemy dealing MeleeDamage. Can proc Double Attack. Cooldown of {0} seconds.

data.name: TD_ShieldBreaker
data.value: You build up strength in your sword arm after blocking an attack. Unleashes MeleeDmg + BlockValue * (100 + {0} * Block Points)% damage. 1 Block Point is awarded for each block; lasting {1} seconds. {2} Block Points maximum. Ignores enemy armor.

data.name: TD_ShieldMastery
data.value: Increases Chance to Block by {0} and Block Value by {1}%.

data.name: TD_ManaHull
TD_ShieldBlock
data.value: Increases Chance to Block by {0} for {1} seconds. {2} seconds cooldown.

data.name: TD_SwiftFightStyle
data.value: You gain swiftness by adjusting your fight style. Reduces the cooldown of Bash and Light Arrow by {0} seconds and the cooldown of Quick Strike and Firewhirl by {1} seconds.

data.name: TD_Firewhirl
data.value: Casts a small whirl of fire that deals {0}% - {1}% fire damage. {2} secs cast time. {3} secs cooldown.

data.name: TD_CorrosiveFire
data.value: Firewhirl also burns the target for {0}% to {1}% fire damage over {2} seconds.

data.name: TD_ImpactTheory
data.value: By studying the properties of matter you gain a {0}% chance for Firewhirl to split into {1} to {2} new Firewhirls upon impact.

data.name: TD_AppliedImpactResearch
data.value: Increases the maximum number of new Firewhirls a Firewhirl might split upon impact by {0}.

data.name: TD_Firevortex
data.value: Casts a vortex of fire that deals 100% fire damage and gains {0}% in size and strength every 0.5 seconds. Sucks nearby enemies into it. {1} seconds cast time. {2} seconds cooldown.

data.name: TD_RazorWinds
data.value: You learn to control the winds around a Firevortex. Increases the chance of the vortex to pierce through targets by {0}%.

data.name: TD_MagicalBalance
data.value: You try to find the right balance between the different elements. Increases Critical Strike Bonus of all spells by {0}%.

data.name: TD_RackingPains
TD_RevitalizingStrikes
data.value: You gain a {0}% chance on physical melee or ranged strike to heal self for {1}% of damage done.

data.name: TD_Pyromania
data.value: Reduces the cooldown of all offensive Fire spells by {0}% for {1} seconds. {2} seconds cooldown.

data.name: TD_Firewall
data.value: Casts a wall of fire next to you that deals {0}% to {1}% fire damage. {2} secs cooldown after casting {3} times. {4} sec cast time. Pushback.

data.name: TD_FlamesOfPhlegethon
data.value: Summons {0} wave(s) of fire directly from the underworld. Targets that are hit take {1}% to {2}% fire damage. {3} secs cooldown. {4} secs cast time.

data.name: TD_PiercingFire
data.value: Increases the chance to crit with Firewall and Flames of Phlegethon by {0}%.

data.name: TD_ArrowRush
data.value: You gain a {0}% chance to unleash a Multi Shot when you shoot a normal arrow.

data.name: TD_FireBombChain
data.value: Increases the number of bombs before the cooldown is triggered by {0}. Increases cooldown by {1} seconds. Reduces mana cost.
